column2:
"Yep, this is definitely the rod I lost.
Thank you so much!"

"It's really special to me because it
was a present. Zeno gave it to me
when I first joined ARKS. "

"I've been using it ever since, so it's kind
of like an old friend. What a relief to
get it back!"

"I can't thank you enough!
Please accept this reward, though. After all, this was a client order."

"Oh, and this is a good opportunity to give
you my partner card. Call me anytime.
Okay, see you later!"
"You can now invite Echo to join you as a partner."
